page.title: 10POPULATION:HINTON CHARTERHSE
page.content: THERE IS CONSIDERABLE{COMMUNITY {FEELING}AMONG THE POPULATION OF HINTON CHARTERHOUSE, WHICH RUNS A VERY ACTIVE PARISH COUNCIL. THIS IS CONCERNED WITH MANY ASPECTS OF VILLAGE LIFE, SUCH AS IMPROVING THE FACILITIES OFFERED BY THE MEMORIAL HALL, THE PROVISION OF A LAYBY, AND PROVIDING FOR THE MANY ELDERLY PEOPLE WHO LIVE THERE. ANOTHER CAUSE FOR CONCERN IS THE FACT THAT THE CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE HAVE TO TRAVEL TO FRESHFORD FOR THEIR JUNIOR SCHOOL EDUCATION. THIS VILLAGE IS SOME DISTANCE AWAY, THE OTHER SIDE OF A BUSY MAIN ROAD. THE{JUNIOR SCHOOL IN HINTON CHARTERHOUSE WAS CLOSED A FEW YEARS AGO, DUE TO FALLING ROLLS, SO THE PARENTS OF THE VILLAGE'S CHILDREN HAVE NO CHOICE. IT IS PROBABLY BECAUSE OF THIS THAT THERE ARE VERY FEW YOUNG FAMILIES IN THE VILLAGE AT PRESENT.
